column3: Description
Use this card on any player (including yourself).
Deal 1 damage to a player. You can attack anyone any number of times until you reach your attack limit.
Block a player's offensive card (red text). You may also use defend on any player at ANY time.
Discard any player's building.
Steal a player's building
Draw 3 cards.
Damage another player. This does not use an attack.
Switch hands with another player.
Reveal a player's hand ONLY to you.
Remove 2 cards from a player's hand
Draw 5 cards.
When used, place this card upwards in front of you for everyone to see. These cards will give you a passive buff until removed.
Increase your attack limit by 1.
Pick up +1 card at the end of your turn.
Discard when you are attacked. You do not lose a life.
All players are able to use spells. Increase your attack limit by 1.
Can only be used if ANY player owns a spell tower.
Destroy all player buildings.
Choose a player to return to full health. Remove 2 health.
Disable the effect of ANY card played at ANY moment.
You cannot be targeted until after your next turn.
This must be the last card in the deck. Reveal all player roles.
